citations.narrative:
There is a buildup of brown debris and staining on the lower walls of the guinea pig enclosures. Inadequate cleaning and
sanitation of the primary enclosures can expose the guinea pigs to disease hazards such as bacterial and fugal diseases.
Correct by ensuring that all primary enclosures are kept clean and sanitized often enough to prevent a buildup of dirt and
debris. In addition, primary enclosures must be sanitized at least once every two weeks. Correct by March 13, 2024.
This inspection was conducted with the facility representative and the exit interview was conducted with a family member.
n

narrative:
3.31(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is a buildup of brown debris and staining on the lower walls of the guinea pig enclosures. Inadequate cleaning and 
sanitation of the primary enclosures can expose the guinea pigs to disease hazards such as bacterial and fugal diseases. 
Correct by ensuring that all primary enclosures are kept clean and sanitized often enough to prevent a buildup of dirt and 
debris. In addition, primary enclosures must be sanitized at least once every two weeks. Correct by March 13, 2024. 
 
This inspection was conducted with the facility representative and the exit interview was conducted with a family member. 
 
 n
